This always seems to happends for the first project in package explorer. Yesterday I had selected another 
workingset before closing eclipse, and when I restarted eclipse I got the same issue for the first project in 
package explorer, even when the first project was another project then the one I filed this bugreport on.
attempting to re-assign to platform ui
Kaj what plugins do you have loaded?
This was fixed by the fix for Bug 114962 (that code path has been deleted).
